head.title: IN BRIEF: Government; AWARD FOR TECHNOLOGY

hedline.hl1: IN BRIEF: Government; AWARD FOR TECHNOLOGY

abstract.p: Westchester County Community Help Desk, which provides assistance to residents on Internet, wins Best Practices Award from New York State Forum for Information Resource Management (S)

block.p: Westchester's Community Help Desk, which provides assistance to residents on the Internet, has won a ''Best Practices Award'' from the New York State Forum for Information Resource Management. The award is one of four the county has received for improved government services through the use of technology. The Community Help Desk also recently received a Certificate of Recognition for ''innovative government solutions'' from the Eastern Regional Government Technology Conference Advisory Board in Albany. Earlier in the year, the county received an achievement award for its Geographic Information Systems from the Environmental Systems Research Institute in Redlands, Calif. The help desk stores knowledge from professionals who deal with at-risk youths and the elderly.
